title: Mr. Creswell's Hidden Rock'n Adventures
subtitle: Mr. Creswell’s Hidden Rock’N Adventures is a warm, curiosity-driven children’s story about noticing the beauty that other people walk past. At its heart, the book follows the real Mr. Creswell — a gentle, bearded rock lover with a green beanie and a workshop full of different minerals — and his two children, Arora and Jasper. Through simple everyday moments along rivers, beaches, and gravel paths, they discover that rocks hold hidden colors, patterns, and stories. Along the way, young readers learn that sometimes the most ordinary-looking stones hold extraordinary beauty inside
included:
Each order comes with:

1 copy of Mr. Creswell’s Hidden Rock’N Adventures

1 mystery mineral (hand-selected — every order is a surprise!)

sticker pack

A perfect little adventure bundle for curious kids.
